articles.description: McGregor, 51, praised Ingram, 29, as 'a brilliant actor,' 'a brilliant woman' and 'absolutely amazing in this series.'
articles.content:
Ewan McGregor has blasted fans who sent his Star Wars costar Moses Ingram 'horrendous' racist direct messages after the debut of the franchise's series last week.
Ingram, who plays Reva Sevanda - th… [+7755 chars]

articles.author: Adam S. Levy, Sameer Suri
articles.title: Matthew Morrison was fired from SYTYCD job for 'inappropriate relationship with female contestant' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The contestant spoke with producers about the 43-year-old entertainer after he 'reached out to her through flirty direct messages on social media.'
articles.content:
Matthew Morrison was fired last week as a judge on the Fox TV show So You Think You Can Dance 'after he had an inappropriate relationship with a female contestant.'
